dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: gevent is a coroutine-based Python networking library.
dependent_to.name: py-gevent

dependent_to.description: Storm is an object-relational mapper (ORM) for Python
dependent_to.name: py-storm

dependent_to.description: An asynchronous networking framework written in Python
dependent_to.name: py-twisted

dependent_to.description:
Software framework for scalable cross-language services development.
Thrift combines a software stack with a code generation engine to build
services that work efficiently and seamlessly between C++, Java, Python,
PHP, Ruby, Erlang, Perl, Haskell, C#, Cocoa, JavaScript, Node.js,
Smalltalk, OCaml and Delphi and other languages.
dependent_to.name: thrift

description:
This package provides an implementation of "object interfaces" for
Python. Interfaces are a mechanism for labeling objects as conforming to
a given API or contract. So, this package can be considered as
implementation of the Design By Contract methodology support in Python.
name: py-zope-interface

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
